pages.title: Stone Anvil
pages.text: Stone anvils are created by right-clicking with a Hammer on the top of a Raw Igneous Stone block, distinguishable by its decreased height. Right click the anvil to open the GUI and place the hammer inside to keep the anvil from turning back into a regular stone block.

pages.title: Metal Anvil
pages.text: Metal Anvils are crafted with Double Ingots.$(br2)Anvils are the crafting interface for nearly all advanced tools and armors.
